cast.overview: A biopic depicting the life of filmmaker and aviation pioneer Howard Hughes from 1927 to 1947, during which time he became a successful film producer and an aviation magnate, while simultaneously growing more unstable due to severe obsessive-compulsive disorder.
cast.title: The Aviator

cast.overview: New Jersey car mechanic Stacie Andree and her police detective girlfriend Laurel Hester both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits after she was diagnosed with a terminal illness.
cast.title: Freeheld

cast.overview: Pennsylvania, 1956. Frank Sheeran, a war veteran of Irish origin who works as a truck driver, accidentally meets mobster Russell Bufalino. Once Frank becomes his trusted man, Bufalino sends him to Chicago with the task of helping Jimmy Hoffa, a powerful union leader related to organized crime, with whom Frank will maintain a close friendship for nearly twenty years.
cast.title: The Irishman

details.biography: Kevin O'Rourke (born January 25, 1956) is an American film, stage, and television actor, best known for his roles as radio station manager Scott Sherwood in Remember WENN (1996–1998), as Hollywood icon Spencer Tracy in The Aviator (2004), and as construction magnate/politician Edward Bader in Boardwalk Empire (2010 - 2013).
details.name: Kevin O'Rourke
